name: Influence (itch)
description:
Influence is a game about spreading your influence in space. Conquer planets, harvest mana, spend mana on upgrades, and make spaceships with which you try and defeat the enemy. Easy, right?

Planned features:
- Story mode (per race).
- Level editor.
- Better AI.
- Unlockables / Permanent upgrades.

This game is made for android tablets. Android .apk will be uploaded when the game is done.
